# Articulations

## Sternoclavicular joint

Articulation between [*clavicular facets*](#clavicular-facets) of the sternum with the clavicle @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017


## Sternocostal Joints

The first sternocostal joint is immediately inferior to the sternoclavicular joint.

## Manubriosternal Joint {#manubriosternal-joint}

One of the *intrasternal joints* of the sternum @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.

## Xiphisternal Joint {#xiphisternal-joint}

One of the *intrasternal joints* of the sternum @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.
The xiphisternal joint connects the xiphoid to the sternum and is an articulation made of *fibrocartilage* @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.

:::{.callout-note}

By 40 years old, the xiphisternal joint *often* ossifies @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.

:::
